member.name: T:AverageUnitsShippedByEmployee.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AverageUnitsShippedByEmployee.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AverageUnitsShippedByEmployee.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:AverageUnitsShippedByEmployee.frmAverageUnitsByEmployee.btnReset_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Calls the function ResetForm on click of the reset button.

member.name: M:AverageUnitsShippedByEmployee.frmAverageUnitsByEmployee.btnEnter_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Enters current input into the list of units shipped for the employee and date emphasized. Upon completion of a week by an employee, their average is displayed. Upon completion of 3 employees, the overall average per day is also displayed.

member.name: M:AverageUnitsShippedByEmployee.frmAverageUnitsByEmployee.ResetForm
member.summary: Sub-function what resets the form to its default state.
